backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining user profiles, expanded 7‑task surgery case model, access‑controlled CRUD operations, and migration integration.
backend/migration.mo: Transforms old two‑task case data into the new seven‑task structure with default values while preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping expanded tasks, UI changes, and CSV updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file including hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing auth, profile setup, case UI, sorting, CSV actions, and overall layout.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Provides a camera interface for starting, stopping, switching cameras, and capturing photos using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with demographics, date, tasks checklist, and edit handling with local/server sync.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form for creating or editing surgery cases with prefill logic, task configuration, and save/update operations.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Renders a sortable list of case cards with loading and empty states.
Date input component combining manual entry with a popover calendar selector.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Allows quick entry of demographics text and optional camera capture via a dialog.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Controls for selecting sort field and toggling sort direction.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Displays and updates a list of required tasks with checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all stored cases to a CSV file and handles success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvImportDia: UI dialog for uploading and parsing a CSV file, showing warnings/errors and importing parsed cases into the store.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders footer with current year, branding, and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays app header and handles login/logout via Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Shows online/offline status and triggers sync with progress and error feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: React-query store for loading, adding, updating, and importing surgery cases with local persistence and normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks wrapping backend operations for user profiles and surgery cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Handles syncing local pending case changes to the backend and refreshing local storage and query cache.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn() helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines LocalSurgeryCase and CaseFormData types extending backend case structures.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Handles CSV export/import for surgery cases, including validation, parsing, and task column mapping.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and converting dates to and from nanoseconds.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Provides localStorage persistence for cases and last sync timestamps with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Finds the latest matching case by MRN and generates prefill form values from it.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and utilities for creating, normalizing, and updating task checklists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, plugins, and dark mode support.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including summary, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of defined features with their requirements and versions. Used to track app capabilities, problems, and state versioning.
